awards.description: THIS COOPERATIVE AGREEMENT PROVIDES FUNDING TO DEVELOP THE YOCHA DEHE WINTUN NATION'S ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAM. ACTIVITIES INCLUDE MANAGING THE ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE, DEVELOPING AN ADAPTATION PLAN, IMPLEMENTING A RECYCLING PROGRAM, COORDINATING WITH TRIBAL DEPARTMENTS ON ZERO WASTE/POLLUTION PREVENTION WORK, CONSULTING WITH STATE AND FEDERAL AGENCIES, CONDUCTING EDUCATIONAL AND OUTREACH ACTIVITIES, AND ATTENDING TRAINING TO DEVELOP ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAM CAPACITY.   THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT PROVIDES FULL FEDERAL FUNDING IN THE AMOUNT OF $76,500.

DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO YOCHA DEHE WINTUN NATION TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER MULTI-MEDIA ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS

THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT PROVIDES FULL FEDERAL FUNDING IN THE AMOUNT OF $102,729.ACTIVITIES:
THE RECIPIENT WILL PARTICIPATE IN LOCAL AND STATE MEETINGS RELATED TO ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES AFFECTING THE TRIBE, DEVELOP A SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT PROGRAM, PLAN OUTREACH AND EDUCATION ACTIVITIES FOR THE COMMUNITY, AND CONDUCT RESEARCH ON CLIMATE CHANGE ADAPTATION AND MITIGATION.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES AND OUTCOMES INCLUDE COPIES OF QUARTERLY NEWSLETTERS, SUMMARY REPORTS OF OUTREACH AND EDUCATIONAL EVENTS, AND NOTES FROM PLANNING MEETINGS RELATED TO ISSUES OF CLIMATE CHANGE. DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROGRAM ARE THE MEMBERS AND/OR RESIDENTS OF THE YOCHA DEHE WINTUN NATION.
